name: Why the Science System is Failing Us and How DeSci Offers Hope
description:
Science is Broken. There are a multitude of issues with the current 
system ranging from replication crisis to funding to metrics obsessed
publication culture. This talk give an overview of the system of science,
how we got here and where it went wrong. It will then covers decentralised 
science from its first principles and gives an overview of how this grassroots
movement is aiming to Fix Science.
